name: TWO WAYS (itch) (msami.ozdemir)
description:
Educational game for kids.In our game  there are three maps and these are about wisedom- ignorance , war-peace and healthy- unhealthy .  In wisedom-ignorance map with following the good words you should collect the books , bad words and traps will give you spme damage. In war-peace map there are two parts, in war part you should follow the war words and peace words in the peace part.  And last map healthy - unhealthy  you should avoid the unhealthy foods and collect the broccolis.

W= JUMP

A= GO LEFT

D= GO RIGHT

4=RIDE A SCOOTER

0= LEAVE THE SCOOTER
